#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        int n;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        int moves=0;
        for(int j=1;j<=n;j++) {
            int num;
            scanf("%d", &num);
            moves+=num/j;
        }
        if(moves & 1) {
            puts("ALICE");
        } else {
            puts("BOB");
        }
    }
}
